note:
Semi-retired web/graphic designer, I now make the time to get back to making art.

President Arts Alliance of Stratford in Stratford, Connecticut, USA.

The Alliance produces four online, Zoom figure drawing sessions per month featuring models from around the world.

If you want to draw with us, watch for the posts I will share which include the registration links.

Once your registration and payment is completed, I will send you the Zoom meeting link to the figure drawing session.
